actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act to permit greater flexibility in rents in federally subsidized projects of State or local housing finance agencies which are in financial difficulty.

summary.text: Permits changes in rents in federally subsidized projects of State or local housing finance agencies by such agencies in order to maintain financial viability.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act to permit greater flexibility in rents in federally subsidized projects of State or local housing finance agencies which are in financial difficulty.
